queries.querystring: select distinct r.*,count(v.dbn_repv_viewname) Views_Used, min(e.Ref_Status) Extr_Status from dbn_report r, dbn_report_views v, dbn_entities e where (v.dbn_repv_viewname = e.ViewName) and (v.dbn_repv_parid = r.dbn_rep_id) and r.dbn_rep_id ='pRID'

select Sec , count(pr) 'NrPREQ' , sum(specok) 'NrSpecOK' , sum(PREQ_OK) 'NrPREQ_OK' , sum(PDOSS_APP) 'NrPDOSS_APP' , sum(PDOSS_TIC) 'NrPDOSS_TIC' -- , sum(TIC) 'NrTIC' , round(sum(InvBas),0) 'SumInvBas' -- , round(sum(InvSub),2) 'SumInvSub' , round(sum(bdgt),0) 'SumBudget' , round(sum(Comtd),0) 'SumComtd' , case when round(sum(Comtd)/sum(bdgt)*100,2)>90 then concat('MRN_SPE03#06#',round(sum(Comtd)/sum(bdgt)*100,2),'%') when round(sum(Comtd)/sum(bdgt)*100,2)>95 then concat('MRN_SPE03#05#',round(sum(Comtd)/sum(bdgt)*100,2),'%') when sum(Comtd)=0 then concat('MRN_SPE03#F11#',0,'%') else concat('MRN_SPE03#F11#',round(sum(Comtd)/sum(bdgt)*100,2),'%') end 'RelCommitted'
, round(sum(Ordrd),0) 'SumOrdered' , if(round(sum(Ordrd)/sum(bdgt)*100,2)>=98,concat('MRN_SPE03#06#',round(sum(Ordrd)/sum(bdgt)*100,2),'%'),concat(round(sum(Ordrd)/sum(bdgt)*100,2),'%')) 'RelOrdered' , round(sum(invcd),0) 'SumInvoiced' , round(sum(paid),0) 'SumPaid' from ( select distinct mpr.pr PR , left(mpr.matman,1) 'Sec' , mi.DOPA DOPA , mi.BA BA , if(mpr.spec_complete='Y',1,0) 'SpecOK' , if(mprv.status in ('T','A','R','L'),1,0) 'PREQ_OK' -- , if(dos.dos_status in ('T','A'),1,0) 'PDOSS_OK' , if(dos.dos_result='APP',1,0) 'PDOSS_APP' , if(mprv.status='T',1,0) 'PDOSS_TIC' , mpr.invest_basis_amount 'InvBas' , mpr.invest_subst_amount 'InvSub' , mil.com_scheduled 'Bdgt' , mil.com_committed 'Comtd' , mil.sum_ordered 'Ordrd' ,mil.sum_invoiced 'Invcd' ,mil.sum_paid 'Paid'
,concat('MRN_SPE01#PREQ&arg1=',mpr.pr) L from mrqr_pur_req mpr left join mrqr_imputation_lines mil on mil.pr=mpr.pr and mil.year='pYEAR' and left(mil.BA,2)='74' and IF('pBUDGETZERO'='on',mil.com_scheduled=0,mil.com_scheduled>0) left join mrqr_imputation mi on mi.pr=mpr.pr and mi.active='Y' and left(mi.BA,2)='74' left join (select mrqr_pur_req_ver.pr ,max(mrqr_pur_req_ver.pr_version_id) vs_id from mrqr_pur_req_ver inner join mrqr_pur_req on mrqr_pur_req_ver.pr=mrqr_pur_req.pr and mrqr_pur_req.invest_plan_type ='KIM' and mrqr_pur_req.INVEST_REQ_READY='Y' and mrqr_pur_req.INVEST_REQ_YEAR='pYEAR' where mrqr_pur_req_ver.year<='pYEAR' and not(status in ('E') ) group by pr)max on mpr.pr=max.pr left join mrqr_pur_req_ver mprv on mprv.pr_version_id=max.vs_id left join (Select d.dossier , d.status dos_status , c.result dos_result from mrqr_dos d inner join (select dossier , max(dossier_id) id from mrqr_dos where not(status in ('C','E','U')) group by dossier )max on max.id=d.dossier_id inner join mrqr_dos_circlist c on d.dossier_id=c.dossier_id and c.result='APP' and c.org='MR1' )dos on dos.dossier=mpr.pr
where mpr.invest_plan_type ='KIM' and IF('pMATMAN'='',true,mpr.matman like 'pMATMAN') and IF('pSECTION'='',true,left(mpr.matman,1)='pSECTION') and IF('pDIVISION'='Sys',left(mpr.matman,1) in ('S','R','F','N'),left(mpr.matman,1) in ('I','Y')) and mpr.INVEST_REQ_READY='Y' and mpr.INVEST_REQ_YEAR='pYEAR' and IF('pPREQ'='',true,mpr.pr='pPREQ') and (mpr.invest_basis_amount>0) group by pr)qry_preq
group by sec

select DOPA , BA , count(pr) 'NrPREQ' , sum(specok) 'NrSpecOK' , sum(PREQ_OK) 'NrPREQ_OK' , sum(PDOSS_APP) 'NrPDOSS_APP' , sum(PDOSS_TIC) 'NrPDOSS_TIC' , round(sum(InvBas),0) 'SumInvBas' , round(sum(InvSub),0) 'SumInvSub' , round(sum(bdgt),0) 'SumBudget' , round(sum(Comtd),0) 'SumComtd' , case when round(sum(Comtd)/sum(bdgt)*100,2)>90 then concat('MRN_SPE03#06#',round(sum(Comtd)/sum(bdgt)*100,2),'%') when round(sum(Comtd)/sum(bdgt)*100,2)>95 then concat('MRN_SPE03#05#',round(sum(Comtd)/sum(bdgt)*100,2),'%') when sum(Comtd)=0 then concat('MRN_SPE03#F11#',0,'%') else concat('MRN_SPE03#F11#',round(sum(Comtd)/sum(bdgt)*100,2),'%') end 'RelCommitted'
, format(sum(Ordrd),2) 'SumOrdered' , if(round(sum(Ordrd)/sum(bdgt)*100,2)>=98,concat('MRN_SPE03#06#',round(sum(Ordrd)/sum(bdgt)*100,2),'%'),concat(round(sum(Ordrd)/sum(bdgt)*100,2),'%')) 'RelOrdered' , format(sum(invcd),2) 'SumInvoiced' , format(sum(paid),2) 'SumPaid' from ( select distinct
mpr.pr , mi.DOPA DOPA , mi.BA BA , if(mpr.spec_complete='Y',1,0) 'SpecOK' , if(mprv.status in ('T','A','R','L'),1,0) 'PREQ_OK' , if(dos.dos_result='APP',1,0) 'PDOSS_APP' , if(mprv.status='T',1,0) 'PDOSS_TIC' , mpr.invest_basis_amount 'InvBas' , mpr.invest_subst_amount 'InvSub' , mil.com_scheduled 'Bdgt' , mil.com_committed 'Comtd' , mil.sum_ordered 'Ordrd' ,mil.sum_invoiced 'Invcd' ,mil.sum_paid 'Paid'
from mrqr_pur_req mpr left join mrqr_imputation_lines mil on mil.pr=mpr.pr and mil.year='pYEAR' and left(mil.BA,2)='74' and IF('pBUDGETZERO'='on',mil.com_scheduled=0,mil.com_scheduled>0) left join mrqr_imputation mi on mi.pr=mpr.pr and mi.active='Y' and left(mi.BA,2)='74' left join (select mrqr_pur_req_ver.pr ,max(pr_version_id) vs_id from mrqr_pur_req_ver inner join mrqr_pur_req on mrqr_pur_req_ver.pr=mrqr_pur_req.pr and mrqr_pur_req.invest_plan_type ='KIM' and mrqr_pur_req.INVEST_REQ_READY='Y' and mrqr_pur_req.INVEST_REQ_YEAR='pYEAR' where mrqr_pur_req_ver.year<='pYEAR' and not(mrqr_pur_req_ver.status in ('E') ) group by pr)max on mpr.pr=max.pr left join mrqr_pur_req_ver mprv on mprv.pr_version_id=max.vs_id left join (Select d.dossier , d.status dos_status , c.result dos_result from mrqr_dos d inner join (select dossier , max(dossier_id) id from mrqr_dos where not(status in ('C','E','U')) group by dossier )max on max.id=d.dossier_id inner join mrqr_dos_circlist c on d.dossier_id=c.dossier_id and c.result='APP' and c.org='MR1' )dos on dos.dossier=mpr.pr
where mpr.invest_plan_type ='KIM' and IF('pMATMAN'='',true,mpr.matman like 'pMATMAN') and IF('pSECTION'='',true,left(mpr.matman,1)='pSECTION') and IF('pDIVISION'='Sys',left(mpr.matman,1) in ('S','R','F','N'),left(mpr.matman,1) in ('I','Y')) and mpr.INVEST_REQ_READY='Y' and mpr.INVEST_REQ_YEAR='pYEAR' and IF('pPREQ'='',true,mpr.pr='pPREQ') group by pr)qry_preq
group by DOPA,BA
